task:
Using the kidney Xenium dataset (300-gene panel) with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), assign each cell to one of the 20 populations in the vocabulary below, then report the overall distribution as the percentage of total cells per type. Use exact vocabulary strings. The percentages should sum to ~100%.

Vocabulary: Pod, Glom-EC, non-glom EC, PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj-PT, FR-PT, DTL, TAL, DCT, CNT, PC, ICA, ICB, Uro, PEC, Fib, Per-SMC, Immune

cell_type_percentages.description: Each cell type percentage must be within Â±3% of ground truth
